trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Valledupar
There were no other sightings in Valledupar on or around January 14th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsYOU PROBABLY ALREADY HAVE THIS REPORT BUT IT IS CURIOUS THAT FOR ABOUT 10 DAYS WE WERE WATCHING THE EXACT SAME UFO, DISGUISING AS A PLANE, FLYING VERY SLOW, LEAVING A BRIGHT ORANGE TRAIL, TOO SHORT FOR THE USUAL WHITE TRAIL OF ANY COMERCIAL AIRLINER. THIS IS THE FIRST TIME WE NOTICE SOMETHING LIKE THIS IN THE PAST 16 YEARS I'VE BEEN AROUND. I WOULD LIKE YOU GUYS TO DETERMINE THE ALTITUDE AND THE SPEED OF THIS THING. I KNOW YOU ALWAYS DOUBLECHECK IF THE SCENE HAS BEEN ALTERED BUT THIS IS NOT THE CASE, I DON'T WANT ANY PUBLICITY, I JUST WANT TO KNOW IF WE ARE DEALING WITH AN HOLOGRAM, WHICH I SUSPECT IT IS. ONCE I GET THE VIDEO DOWNLOADED TO A MPG OR AVI FORMAT I'LL SEND IT THIS THURSDAY. BESTS, JOSE DAVID
Summary: WE ALL SAW A PLANE BUT THE VIDEO SHOWS SOMETHING ELSE
